body: for those of you wondering "why the lack of comments" the answer is simple, the people who fapped to this fapped so hard they lost the ability to move their hands from the wrists up due to wankers cramp. it has already been about a day since i fapped to this, so my ability to move my hands has returned, And so i have come with a warning.
